Posts.EditableText:
Have just completed writing a game using Quest 5.3
If I download Quest 5.4, will this mess up my game? Should I upload the game first?
Posts.HTML:
Have just completed writing a game using Quest 5.3
If I download Quest 5.4, will this mess up my game? Should I upload the game first?

Posts.EditableText:
It will make changes to your game, for some new data types, etc. I'd recommend a good backup before upgrading.

You could upload the game first. Just be sure you save the original somewhere.
Posts.HTML:
It will make changes to your game, for some new data types, etc. I'd recommend a good backup before upgrading.

You could upload the game first. Just be sure you save the original somewhere.

Posts.EditableText: Many thanks for your help. Game posted, new Quest version downloaded, and fingers crossed!
Posts.HTML: Many thanks for your help. Game posted, new Quest version downloaded, and fingers crossed!
